articles.author: Nick Cawley
articles.title: US Dollar Jumps on Stronger-Than-Expected Inflation Data, Gold Crumbles into Support - DailyFX
articles.description: US inflation was reported higher-than-expected in January, sending US Treasury yields and the US dollar sharply higher.
articles.content:
US Dollar Index, US Treasuries, Gold Analysis and Charts
  • US shelter and food costs continue to rise, energy costs fall.
  • US dollar index jumps over half a point, and gold turns lower.… [+2686 chars]
